name: GetAbsenceByAbsenceId
description:
__Activity name :__ GetAbsenceByAbsenceId

Get the details of an Absence

absenceId.description: The unique identifier of an absence

Authorization.description: A valid Bearer token for authorizing the request.

Accept.description: The accept header is used to influence what type of output is returned and in most cases the version of the output

$ul: **version**
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
**messages**
**content**
**accidentType**: The type of accident that led to the absence. This field will be NULL if the absence is not related to an accident.
**key**: The key of the accident type. Possible values can be aquired via the metadata endpoint.
**value**: Description of the accident type.
**actionToBeTakenByOccupationalHealthAndSafetyService**: The desired action to be taken regarding the absence by the occupational health and safety service (arbodienst).
**key**: The key of the desired action to be taken by the occupational health and safety service. Possible values can be aquired via the metadata endpoint.
**value**: Description of the desired action to be taken by the occupational health and safety service.
**caseManager**
**function**: Function of the case manager.
**name**: Name of the case manager for reintegration.
**organization**: Function of the case manager.
**phoneNumber**: The phone number of the employee.
**causeOfAbsence**: The cause of the absence. This endpoint is intended for the registration of two types of absence:
**key**: The key of the cause of the absence. Possible values can be acquired via the metadata endpoint
**value**: Description of the cause of the absence.
**comments**: Free text field to register any relevant information.
**contactInformation**
**city**: City of the address
**country**
**isoCode**: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 value for the country
**key**: The key for the country. Posible values can be aquired via the metadata endpoint
**value**: The name of the country
**endDate**: end date of the contact information
**furtherIndication**
**key**: The key of the further indication. Posible values can be aquired via the metadata endpoint
**value**: The description of the further indication, the posible values are "WW" and "AB"
**houseNumber**: House number of the address
**houseNumberAddition**: An addition to further specify the house/door/postbox. For example used to specifty a room of floor number in addition to the house number.
**locationType**: soort verpleegadres
**key**: The key of the location type. Posible values can be aquired via the metadata endpoint
**value**: Description of location type
**name**: name of the institute for the contact information.
**phoneNumber**: The phone number to contact the employee on.
**postalCode**: The postal code of the address
**startDate**: start date of the contact information
**street**: Streetname of the address
**expectedDateOfChildbirth**: Bevallingsdatum
**expectedDuration**: The expected duration of the absence. If the expected duration is unknown, this field will be NULL.
**key**: The key of the expected duration of the absence. Possible values can be acquired via the metadata endpoint.
**value**: Description of the expected duration of the absence.
**expectedEndDateOfMaternityLeave**: verwachte datum einde zwangerschapsverlof
**hasMobilityIssue**: This field indicates whether the Employee has an issue limiting its mobility.
**hoursWorkedOnFirstDayOfAbsence**: The number of hours worked on the first day of the absence.
**id**: The unique identifier of an object (GUID/UUID)
**isDisruptedEmploymentRelationship**: Indicates whether the employement relationship between employee and employer is disrupted.
**isHospitalised**: Betreft het een ziekenhuisopnamen
**isRecoveredWithinTwoWeeks**: This field indicates whether the Employee is (expected) recoverd within two weeks, relating to a full recovery.
**isThirdPartyLiability**: This field is related to `accidentType`.
**isWorkRelatedIllness**: Beroepsziekte
**progress**
**currentIncapacityPercentage**: percentage of not being able to work
**endOfAbsence**: date and reason for the closing/end of the absence
**date**: The last day of the absence.
**reason**: redenhersteld
**key**: The key of the reason why the absence is ended. Possible values can be aquired via the metadata endpoint.
**value**: Description of the reason why the absence ended.
**startDate**: start dat of the incapacityPercentage
**reintegration**
**dateOfFinalizingPlanOfAction**: The day on which a plan of action (for return to normal work) was finalized.
**reintegrationGoal**
**key**: The key for the reintegration goal. Related to the Wet Verbetering Poortwachter.
**value**: The name of the country
**version**
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
